reviewText: I recommend this product if you have had a baby.  It helps in the areas she describes in the video.  Even your husband can do some the the excercises because you really feel them.  The exercises are safe.  I have recommended this to people who have issues with badder'leakages after birth, those who need muscle tightening etc.  Although, I have been a busy mom and haven't been able to watch any videos in a long time.  This is one excercise video that you can use indefinately.
